## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b549294cdb630583b2b0b261dee0e76a8bb14f52602b9baca8abc582dd464234)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ironfish-rust-nodejs' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
